title: dhanyayAyi
sahitya:
dhanyayAyi jnyAninnu ramaNa palanAL kUDi tAvaka mukhAvalOkanEna


anupallavi

  anyA sAdhAraNa manOhari navakAntE


caraNam 1    aranALika pOlumayi ninnE piriyAjnya varanengu gata 
nAyI yennu taruNijnyan parihAsam paramenganE sahikkunnu
    caraNam 2    vannu bata mAmaka savidhe vaikAtE vAncitam sAdhaya 
krpayA pannagEndra shayana shrI padmanAbha dEva
